name: canshare-who-histology-plasmacytoid-dendritic-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid plasmacytoid dendritic cell neoplasm histology
description: Histologies used for plasmacytoid dendritic cell neoplasm (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours) or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: 262461000210104 |Mature plasmacytoid dendritic cell proliferation with myeloid neoplasm (morphologic abnormality)| OR 445030005 |Blastic plasmacytoid dendritic cell neoplasm| OR 74964007 |Other|

contains.display: Mature plasmacytoid dendritic cell proliferation with myeloid neoplasm
